腞字的基本解释

腞
zhuàn
〔腞楯（
ch憂 ）〕古代运灵柩的车，如“死得于腞腞之上。”

腞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuàn］
［《集韻》柱兖切，上獮，澄。］
见“腞楯”。

腞字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　腞； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页988第03
【集韻】杜本切，音?。行曳踵。或作腯豚。　又徒困切，音鈍。義同。　又【集韻】【正韻】?柱兗切，音?。【集韻】篆也。【正韻】與瑑同。【莊子·達生篇】得死於腞楯之上。【釋文】腞，猶篆也。腞楯，雕俎也。　又【集韻】敕轉切，音蜳。義同。【莊子·達生篇·腞楯音義】腞。直轉反，又敕轉反。　又陁沒切，音揬。肥也。與腯同。

腞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
腞字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　腞; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: Page 988 No. 03
[Jiyun] Du Benqie, sound?. Line drag heel. Or as a dolphin.　It's just sleepy and cut again, and the sound is dull. The same meaning.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Zhu Yan cut, sound?. [Ji Yun] Seal also. 【Zheng Yun】Same as Yuan. [Zhuangzi·Dasheng Chapter] You have to die on top of the chestnut. [Explanation] 腞, still seal. Pork, sculptural.　 [Ji Yun] Turn and cut, sound. The same meaning. 【Zhuangzi·Dasheng Chapter·Xinyang Sound and Meaning】Xin. Turn straight and reverse, and then reverse.　There is no cut, soundtrack. Fat too. The same as the hip.
